Class FormatExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wmich.cs1120.LA5.FormatExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFormatExceptionHandler

    public class FormatExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFormatExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FormatExceptionHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleEmailFormatException(EmailAddressFormatException e)
      gets the email string from EmailAddressFormatException, and prints the whole string in lower case
      void handleFileNotFoundException(java.io.FileNotFoundException e)
      prints a message showing which file is not found and that the system cannot find the file
      void handleNameFormatException(NameFormatException e)
      gets the name string from NameFormatException, splits the string into a string array with the first index as the first name and second index and the last name.
      void handlePhoneNumberFormatException(PhoneNumberFormatException e)
      gets the phoneNumber string from PhoneNumberFormatException, removes any non number characters, then prints in the format ([0-9][0-9][0-9])-[0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9], using the modified phoneNumber

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • handlePhoneNumberFormatException

        public void handlePhoneNumberFormatException(PhoneNumberFormatException e)
        gets the phoneNumber string from PhoneNumberFormatException, removes any non number characters, then prints in the format ([0-9][0-9][0-9])-[0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9], using the modified phoneNumber
        Specified by:
        handlePhoneNumberFormatException in interface IFormatExceptionHandler
        Parameters:
        e - exception passed to this handler, contains necessary string

      • handleEmailFormatException

        public void handleEmailFormatException(EmailAddressFormatException e)
        gets the email string from EmailAddressFormatException, and prints the whole string in lower case
        Specified by:
        handleEmailFormatException in interface IFormatExceptionHandler
        Parameters:
        e - exception passed to this handler, contains necessary string

      • handleNameFormatException

        public void handleNameFormatException(NameFormatException e)
        gets the name string from NameFormatException, splits the string into a string array with the first index as the first name and second index and the last name. each index value has the first character capitalized and the rest of the string as lower case
        Specified by:
        handleNameFormatException in interface IFormatExceptionHandler
        Parameters:
        e - exception passed to this handler, contains necessary string
